label: Telegram to Representative Robert Turner from Isaiah Bennett
description: Telegram to Representative Robert Turner from Isaiah Bennett requesting a public hearing be held on poverty and discrimination at the Medical College.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
TM MAR 3 1210P EST
MINN NL (BACKDATED) FEB 28

REP ROBERT TURNER

3983 RIVERS AVE
CHARLESTON SOCAR

DEAR REP TURNER:

THANKS AGAIN FOR THE SPECIAL EFFORT MADE BY THE
ENTIRE CHARLESTON DELEGATION TO HEAR THE WORKERS OF THE
MEDICAL COLLEGE HOSPITAL. HOWEVER, I DO NOT
THINK THAT THE MATTER CAN STOP HERE. I REQUEST, ON
BEHALF OF THE WORKERS, A PUBLIC HEARING TO BE HELD
CONCERNING THE CONDITIONS OF POVERTY AND DISCRIMINATION
WHICH EXIST AT THE MEDICAL COLLEGE HOSPITAL AMONG 
IT [sic] EMPLOYEES. I REQUEST THAT THIS HEARING BE HELF [sic] IN
CHARLESTON. SINCERELY

ISAIAH BENNETT
ORGANIZER OF HOSP[ITAL]
WORKERS IN S.C.

(SPECIAL CHARGE)
NATL [NATIONAL] ASSOC [ASSOCIATION] OF HOSP. [HOSPITAL]
WORKERS AND NURSING
HOME EMPLOYEES
655 E[AST] BAY ST
